name: A New Light
description:
This is a prototype 

An RPG (Role-playing-game) based on fighting in dungeons, building up a faction an conquering the farlands. 

What ever you do,  just have fun

This game was made with help of the RPG kit made by Unity Technologies                            https://learn.unity.com/project/creator-kit-rpg

Yet this game has been worked on less then 24 hours so our own assets will be coming in to.

If you can donate that will be greatly appreciated and you will get early access to the alpha, beta and pre-release 

Controls

W,A,S,D - move

A,D - select speech

[space] Select

.
